trends: There have been no other sightings in Terrace
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailssighting report: march 17 2005...thursday...early morning at 2:00 am pst...clear sky...temp-2degree celcius...star lit sky with crescent moon...moon last observed midnight...12:00pm pst march 16\05...awoke at 2:00 am pst...march 17 2005 with bright crecent moon shining in window...window faces towards az 320...ie aprox n40w...first thought..."what a bright crescent moon"...whole room is lit up and i can see most everything in the room as if some search light is being used to shine through the window...window is 5 by 6 feet...i am groggy...turn on light...i get up go to the washroom...come back to the room look at watch... 2:00 am...turn off light to room...and...crescent moon light is gone...go to window and look out into sky and no moon to be seen...dog in hallway is sound asleep...motion sensor light comes on at back of house 2:20am pst march 17 2005...nothing else happens...a moon disapears in less than 1.5 minutes seems not possible...will be up watching moon to see exact time\position\and movement of moon...late evening to early morning march 18 2005...time of this posting is 10:45am pst march17,2005...
